short_summary: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) seeks 5100 jackets of various sizes for patrol use.
description: NPP Jacket patrol contract for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) to provide a firm quantity of 5100 jackets, with optional quantities and as-and-when quantities, in accordance with RCMP Specification No: G.S. 1045-354 dated 2024-02-06.
tags: end user entities: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
full_summary:
**Government Tender Notice**
=====================================================

### Title - Titre

* French: **M7594-245436 AMP Blouson de patrouille**
* English: **M7594-245436 NPP Jacket patrol**

### Reference Number - Numéro de référence

* **WS4510204510-Doc4521219236**

### Solicitation and Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number - Numéro de sollicitation**: WS4510204510
* **Publication Date - Date de publication**: 2024-04-04
* **Tender Closing Date - Date limite d'appel d'offres**: 2024-04-19T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date - Date prévue de début du contrat**: 2027-06-04

### Contract and Tender Details

* **Contracting Entity - L'entité contractante**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entities - Entités utilisatrices finales**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
* **Regions of Delivery - Régions de livraison**: Ottawa
* **Category of Goods - Catégorie de biens**: *Clothing (Vêtements) - UNSPC Code: 53100000

### Procurement Process

* **Procurement Method - Méthode d'approvisionnement**: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Selection Criteria - Critères de sélection**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price (Cote combinée la plus élevée pour le mérite technique et le prix)

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person - Personne de contact**: Hevey, Mathieu (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email - Email de contact**: mathieu.hevey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL - URL de l'avis**: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19307830?extsite=MTkzMDc4MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Description of the Requirement

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires a firm quantity of 5100 Jackets Patrol (with various sizes) in accordance with RCMP Specification No: G.S. 1045-354 dated 2024-02-06. The requirement includes option quantities and as-and-
